It may also include objectives, pre-conditions and end-conditions.  Finally, it may convey specifics about the activity such as body site, method, route, etc.

element.requirements: Used to capture information that applies to the plan as a whole that doesn't fit into discrete elements.
element.definition: General notes about the care plan not covered elsewhere.
